subject: Power Cord Fraying - BLD-150 Safety Concern
body:
Dear BreezeLite Support,

I'm writing about a serious safety concern with my BLD-150 Everyday Dryer purchased on March 8, 2026.

The power cord insulation has begun fraying near the connection to the unit. I can see exposed wiring in one area, which is obviously a serious electrical hazard.

I have not wrapped the cord around the dryer, dropped the unit, or damaged it in any way. This appears to be a manufacturing defect with the power cord assembly.

This is still well within the 3-month warranty period. Given the safety risk, I need immediate assistance.

Please advise on next steps for replacement.

Thank you,
Robert Johnson
